name: Have you seen this image?
description:
A simple but angry game for the #lowrezjam 2016. Your parents must be very sad.

Mad props to all the sound providers at freesound: autistic-lucario dermotte fins gabrielaraujo grunz liquidhot michael-kur95 nanakisan nenadsimic qubodup ryansnook splashdust the-baron wagna. The music is Pixelland by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com), under CC-BY. Thanks to Ronnie Tucker for theming thoughts!
